column4: anyone have a how-to for intel pro wireless 3945?  it detects networks but does not connect.
well i certainly have an issue with that 3945 card Fryguy-- i have searched google forever
jack_sparrow do you have any info on intel 3945 wireless?
- i also had no issues with the same card, perhaps that explains the lack of info on google. what have you tried so far?
tried adjusting time out value ... was one suggestion.. tried backports.
- im thinkin you did more harm by messing with the settings
